titles.title: He's The Alpha And Omega, The Beginning And The End

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's the Alpha and Omega, the Beginning and the End,
And somewhere in between, we just get lost.
And somewhere in between, we just get lost.
He's making known unto us the mystery of His will.
He's making known the mystery of life.
He's making us to be the very praise of His glory,
And somewhere in between, we just get lost.
